text: læa ha kxallxhˌ ca thrng hı thukkh phay prasb kæ cea læw k mimi phu dı pldpeluxng man di nxkcak phraxngkh læa hak phraxngkh thrng prarthna khwam di kæ cea læw k ca mimi phu dı kidkan khwam pordpran khxng phraxngkh di phraxngkh ca thrng hı prasb kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh cak pwng baw khxng phraxngkh læa phraxngkh ca pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng metta semx
